// Test du module ual(a[31..0], b[31..0], cmd[3..0] : s[31..0], N, Z, V, C)

// add
set a[31..0] 00000000000000000000000000000000
set b[31..0] 00000000000000000000000000000000
set cmd[3..0] 0000
check s[31..0] 00000000000000000000000000000000
check C 0
check V 0
check N 0
check Z 1

// add
set a[31..0] 01111111111111111111111111111111
set b[31..0] 00000000000000000000000000000001
set cmd[3..0] 0000
check s[31..0] 10000000000000000000000000000000
check C 0
check V 1
check N 1
check Z 0

// add
set a[31..0] 11111111111111111111111111111111
set b[31..0] 10000000000000000000000000000000
set cmd[3..0] 0000
check s[31..0] 01111111111111111111111111111111
check C 1
check V 1
check N 0
check Z 0

// add
set a[31..0] 01111111111111111111111111111111
set b[31..0] 10000000000000000000000000000000
set cmd[3..0] 0000
check s[31..0] 11111111111111111111111111111111
check C 0
check V 0
check N 1
check Z 0

// add
set a[31..0] 11111111111111111111111111111111
set b[31..0] 01111111111111111111111111111111
set cmd[3..0] 0000
check s[31..0] 01111111111111111111111111111110
check C 1
check V 0
check N 0
check Z 0

// sub
set a[31..0] 00000000000000000000000000000000
set b[31..0] 00000000000000000000000000000001
set cmd[3..0] 0001
check s[31..0] 11111111111111111111111111111111
check C 1
check V 0
check N 1
check Z 0

// sub

set b[31..0] 00000000000000000000000000000001
set cmd[3..0] 0001
check s[31..0] 01111111111111111111111111111110
check C 0
check V 0
check N 0
check Z 0

set cmd[3..0] 0001
check s[31..0] 01111111111111111111111111111111
check C 0
check V 0

check Z 0

// sub
set a[31..0] 01111111111111111111111111111111
set b[31..0] 10000000000000000000000000000000
set cmd[3..0] 0001
check s[31..0] 11111111111111111111111111111111
check C 1
check V 1
check N 1
check Z 0

// sub
set a[31..0] 11111111111111111111111111111111
set b[31..0] 01111111111111111111111111111111
set cmd[3..0] 0001
check s[31..0] 10000000000000000000000000000000
check C 0
check V 0
check N 1
check Z 0

// set
set a[31..0] 00000000010000000000000000000001
set cmd[3..0] 1100
check s[31..0] 00000000010000000000000000000001
check N 0
check Z 0

// set
set a[31..0] 00000000100000000000000000000001
set cmd[3..0] 1100
check s[31..0] 11111111100000000000000000000001
check N 1
check Z 0
